data.text: Leander HauÃmann is a German theatre and film director. The son of actor Ezard HauÃmann and costume designer Doris HauÃmann, he was born in Quedlinburg and attended the Ernst Busch theatre school in Berlin. HauÃmann was the theatre director of the city theatre in Bochum. He also wrote and acted in several plays, and had a role in the Detlev Buck film Jailbirds. His feature film breakthrough came with Sonnenallee in 1999. His second feature, Herr Lehmann, followed in 2003.
